snippet.title: WarMage trailer
snippet.description:
WarMage is an indie strategy game with a fantasy setting.
Summon your army and fight against orcs, bandits, lizardmen and draconians. 
Be careful because each enemy has different abilities and you have to know their weaknesses. 
Your heroes are different too so their team composition is key to victory.
Try the revolutionary new text dungeon mode and send a single adventurer to the underground tunnels.
Collect XP and epic items from in adventure mode.

Download now from Google Play Store or play on PC!
